featured.text: I’m not sure exactly how much scholarship you’ll receive, but it will _____ cover your major expenses.
After spending most of her salary on rent and food, Amelia _____ had any money left for entertainment and other expenses.

definition.zh_def: 支出，花費的金錢或資源。
definition.en_def: The amount of money spent or required for something.
definition.example: Her monthly expenses include rent, utilities, and groceries.
